original_text: That is how God punishes wicked people. God has decided to punish them as they deserve.’ That is how God punishes wicked people. God has decided to punish them as they deserve.’ That is how God punishes wicked people.
korean_text: 이는 악인이 하나님께 받을 분깃이요 하나님이 그에게 정하신 기업이니라

sentences.original_text: That is how God punishes wicked people.
God has decided to punish them
That is how God punishes wicked people.
God has decided to punish them
That is how God punishes wicked people.
